name: Extra flags for 4chan
tagline: Extra Flags for 4chan boards, supports /int/, /sp/ and /pol/.
body:
Extra Flags for 4chan. ========== Originally made for /int/, but we support /sp/ and /pol/ now as well. Made by /ref/ and flags contributed by various /ref/ and /int/ posters. Your flag not here? Create an issue on the [github page](https://github.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-)
![Extra Flags for 4chan](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/screenshot1.png)![Extra Flags for 4chan](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/screenshot2.png) HOW TO INSTALL (Desktop - Chrome/Firefox/Opera) ========== 1. Download GreaseMonkey for Firefox, TamperMonkey for Chrome or ViolentMonkey for Opera. 2. Install the Extra Flags script: [Extra Flags for int.user.js](https://github.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/raw/master/Extra%20Flags%20for%20int.user.js) 3. Set your region to one of the following [flags](https://github.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/tree/master/flegs) 4. Reload the page 5. Post from Quick Reply box (QR) (top form does not work) Video install guides ========== [![Chrome install webm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/chrome-install.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/chrome-install.webm) [![Firefox install webm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/firefox-install.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/firefox-install.webm) [![Opera install webm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/opera-install.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/opera-install.webm) If webms do not play try them here: [/ref/](https://archive.whatisthisimnotgoodwithcomputers.com/ref/thread/6/). To set the region later: - Firefox/greasemonkey: monkey menu > User script commands > Extra flags for /int/ [(Firefox webm guide)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/firefox-edit.webm) - Chrome/tampermonkey: tampermonkey menu > Extra flags for /int/ [(Chrome webm guide)] (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/chrome-edit.webm) HOW TO INSTALL (Android Firefox - might be broken, I dunno fam) ========== 1. [Download](https://github.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/raw/master/android-firefox/extra-flags-for-int-ffma.xpi) the Extension on mobile or scan QR below. 2. Click the download to install (or open with firefox, browse to /sdcard/Download/extra-flags-for-int-ffma.xpi). 3. [DO THIS ONLY IF STEP 2 FAILS] If it blocks the install browse to "about:config" and search for "xpinstall" and flip "xpinstall.signatures.required" to false and retry step 2. After you successfully installed you can flip it back to true. 4. Set you're region in Options > Tools > Add-ons > Extra Flags for int FFMA > Region 5. Refresh any 4chan tab you have open. ![Image of QR](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/Firefox-Android-XPI-QR.png)
